text: Johan Larsson (b. 8 December 1974) is a Swedish musician. He was the first bassist of the melodic death metal band In Flames. He was also the first bassist of the Swedish power metal band HammerFall, but quit before the band recorded an album. ==Album appearances== * Lunar Strain (1994) * Subterranean (1995, EP) * The Jester Race (1996) * Black-Ash Inheritance (1997, EP) * Whoracle (1997) Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Bassists Category:HammerFall Category:Swedish heavy metal guitarists Category:Musicians from Gothenburg
title: Johan Larsson
